description: Anubis, a Ground Element Pal, can be found in the desert northeast of the Sealed Realm of the Winged Tyrant teleport point in Palworld.

partnerSkill.name: Guardian of the Desert
partnerSkill.description: When fighting together, applies Ground damage to the player's attacks. Sometimes dodges attacks with a high-speed sidestep while in battle.

activeSkills.name: Rock Lance
activeSkills.description: Generates a sharp rock spear under an enemy.

activeSkills.name: Ground Smash
activeSkills.description: Anubis special skill. Leaps high into the air before diving to the ground with a punch. The force of the impact deals damage over a wide area.

activeSkills.name: Forceful Charge
activeSkills.description: Anubis special skill. Pursues its foe with a high-speed dash while releasing energy and unleashes a powerful punch.

activeSkills.name: Spinning Roundhouse
activeSkills.description: Anubis special skill. Performs a spin kick with its strong legs, cutting down enemies over a wide area.

description: Arsox is a Fire Element type Pal with the Warm Body Partner Skill.

partnerSkill.name: Warm Body
partnerSkill.description: Can be ridden. Keeps the rider warm in cold environments.

activeSkills.name: Ignis Breath
activeSkills.description: Shoots flames at an enemy, dealing continuous damage.

activeSkills.name: Spirit Fire
activeSkills.description: Shoots fireballs towards an enemy. The fireballs explode after a short distance, generating smaller fireballs that spread forward.

activeSkills.name: Ignis Blast
activeSkills.description: Hurls a ball of fire straight at an enemy.

activeSkills.name: Flare Arrow
activeSkills.description: Fires three flaming arrows in succession that home in on an enemy.

activeSkills.name: Blazing Horn
activeSkills.description: Arsox exclusive skill. Takes aim and rushes at an enemy with a mad dash.

catchStrategy: Bring a Water Type Pal since Arsox is weak to Water element Pals due to its Fire Elemental Type.

materialAndItemDrops.possibleDrops: No specific details on item drops.

description: Astegon, a Dark/Dragon Element Pal, can be found in the Destroyed Mineshaft in the volcanic region and No. 3 Wildlife Sanctuary in Palworld.

partnerSkill.name: Black Ankylosaur
partnerSkill.description: Can be ridden as a flying mount. Increases damage dealt to ore while mounted.

activeSkills.name: Dark Laser
activeSkills.description: Charges dark energy before blasting enemies with a powerful beam.

activeSkills.name: Nightmare Ball
activeSkills.description: Creates a giant ball of darkness and hurls it at an enemy.

activeSkills.name: Draconic Breath
activeSkills.description: Exhales breath imbued with draconic energy, dealing continuous damage to those in front of it.

activeSkills.name: Dragon Meteor
activeSkills.description: Calls down numerous small meteorites and launches them at an enemy.

catchStrategy: Bring an Ice or Dragon Type Pal since Astegon is weak to Ice or Dragon element Pals due to its Dragon Dark Elemental Type.

materialAndItemDrops.possibleDrops: No specific details on item drops.

description: Azurobe, a Water and Dragon Element Pal, can be found in the No. 1 Wildlife Sanctuary and the waters west of the Bridge of Twin Kights in Palworld.

partnerSkill.name: Waterwing Dance
partnerSkill.description: Can be ridden to travel on water. Applies Water damage to the player's attacks while mounted.

activeSkills.name: Aqua Gun
activeSkills.description: Hurls a ball of water straight at an enemy.

activeSkills.name: Bubble Blast
activeSkills.description: Fires numerous bubbles that slowly pursue an enemy.

activeSkills.name: Draconic Breath
activeSkills.description: Exhales breath imbued with draconic energy, dealing continuous damage to those in front of it.

activeSkills.name: Dragon Burst
activeSkills.description: Quickly discharges draconic energy, damaging those around it.

activeSkills.name: Dragon Cannon
activeSkills.description: Hurls an energy ball imbued with draconic energy at an enemy.

catchStrategy: Bring an Electric or Ice Type Pal since Azurobe is weak to Electric or Ice element Pals due to its Water Dragon Elemental Type.

materialAndItemDrops.possibleDrops: No specific details on item drops.

description: Beakon is a Pal with the Thunderous Partner Skill and the Electric Element type.

partnerSkill.name: Thunderous
partnerSkill.description: Can be ridden as a flying mount. Applies Electric damage to the player's attacks while mounted.

location.day: Beakon can be found as a Field Alpha Boss at Level 29.
location.night: No specific details about night habitat.

catchStrategy: Bring a Ground Type Pal since Beakon is weak to Ground element Pals due to its Electric Elemental Type.

materialAndItemDrops.possibleDrops: No specific details on item drops.

description: Beegarde is a Pal with the Worker Bee Partner Skill and the Grass Element type.

partnerSkill.name: Worker Bee
partnerSkill.description: Sometimes drops Honey when assigned to Ranch. While in team, Elizabee's stats will be increased.

activeSkills.name: Wind Cutter
activeSkills.description: Fires a high-speed blade of wind that flies straight at an enemy.

activeSkills.name: Air Cannon
activeSkills.description: Quickly fires a burst of highly pressurized air.

activeSkills.name: Poison Blast
activeSkills.description: Hurls poison sludge at an enemy.

activeSkills.name: Bee Quiet
activeSkills.description: Risks its life to cause a violent explosion but receives the honor of falling in battle.

activeSkills.name: Acid Rain
activeSkills.description: Creates acidic clouds that pour down acid rain on enemies.

location.day: Beegarde can be found as a Field Alpha Boss.
location.night: No specific details about night habitat.

catchStrategy: Bring a Fire Type Pal since Beegarde is weak to Fire element Pals due to its Grass Elemental Type.

materialAndItemDrops.possibleDrops: No specific details on item drops.

description: Blazamut is a Fire Element Pal found in the Scorching Mineshaft. Known for its fiery attacks and powerful skills.

location.day: Blazamut can be found inside the Scorching Mineshaft in the volcanic region of the map in the west.
location.night: No specific details about night habitat.

partnerSkill.name: Magma Kaiser
partnerSkill.description: Can be ridden. Enhances Fire attacks while mounted.

activeSkills.name: Power Shot
activeSkills.description: Charges energy into a focused blast.

activeSkills.name: Stone Blast
activeSkills.description: Fires a barrage of stones forward.

activeSkills.name: Ignis Breath
activeSkills.description: Shoots flames at an enemy, dealing continuous damage.

activeSkills.name: Ignis Blast
activeSkills.description: Hurls a ball of fire straight at an enemy.

activeSkills.name: Fire Ball
activeSkills.description: Creates a giant ball of flame and hurls it at an enemy. The ball explodes over a wide area upon impact.

activeSkills.name: Ignis Rage
activeSkills.description: Energizes the surrounding ground, causing it to explode after a set amount of time.

passiveSkills.status: Under research! Please check back soon.

catchStrategy: Bring a Water Type Pal since Blazamut is weak to Water element Pals due to its Fire Elemental Type.

materialAndItemDrops.possibleDrops: No specific details on item drops.

description: Blazehowl is a Pal with the Hellflame Lion Partner Skill and the Fire Element type. Known for its fiery attacks and powerful skills.

location.day: Blazehowl can be found inside the Scorching Mineshaft in the volcanic region of the map in the west.
location.night: No specific details about night habitat.

partnerSkill.name: Hellflame Lion
partnerSkill.description: Can be ridden. While fighting together, Grass Pals drop more items when defeated.

activeSkills.name: Power Shot
activeSkills.description: Charges energy into a focused blast.

activeSkills.name: Stone Blast
activeSkills.description: Fires a barrage of stones forward.

activeSkills.name: Ignis Breath
activeSkills.description: Shoots flames at an enemy, dealing continuous damage.

activeSkills.name: Ignis Blast
activeSkills.description: Hurls a ball of fire straight at an enemy.

activeSkills.name: Fire Ball
activeSkills.description: Creates a giant ball of flame and hurls it at an enemy. The ball explodes over a wide area upon impact.

activeSkills.name: Ignis Rage
activeSkills.description: Energizes the surrounding ground, causing it to explode after a set amount of time.
